entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:08 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 1:08 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
